::Spears::

She held her breath as Striker picked her up.  She closed her eyes 
and wrapped her arms around Striker's neck.  She felt herself holding 
back the rising fear in her.  She felt him swerve and weave as they 
flew along.  

"Ah...yeah...good idea.  Let's stop by and see if they need us for 
anything."  as she swallowed hard.  

She kept her eyes tightly shut, so as not to see how far off the 
ground they were.  She hated fear of hers.  It made her feel weak and 
helpless against it.  She tightened her arms around Striker a little 
more and burried her face into his shoulder. She tried with all her 
spark to keep her fear down and out of her mind.  



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker smiles, sweeping Spears off her feet and flying off toward 
the Ark, 
> slowly at first and at a low altitude. He looks at her, not kissing 
her only 
> because he had to look where he was going in order to avoid trees.
> 
> "Let's drop by at the Ark in case they need any help, eh?" he says, 
swirling 
> to avoid a tree.
